EmailTemplate.name: RejectedRequest
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration to Course Rejected!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration to Course Rejected
Dear, {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}.
Thank you for taking time to choose Course Management.
Unfortunately, your request to take a courses has been rejected.
One of our managers will contact you as soon as possible to tell you about it.
Best wishes, Course Management Team
